Member Function Documentation

◆ getAnimationFrame()

void rev::Animation::getAnimationFrame ( float  timeInSec,
const AnimationSettings &  settings,
AnimationPlaybackMode  mode,
bool &  isDonePlaying,
BlendSet &  outFrames,
uint32_t  clipIndex = 0 
)

Return map of bone transforms at the given animation time (in seconds)

Transform vector is ordered by bone ID @params[in] clipIndex the index of the clip in the blend queue for which the frame is being retrieved Speed factor is multiplicative Returns false if done playing

Member Data Documentation

◆ m_nodeAnimations

std::vector<NodeAnimation> rev::Animation::m_nodeAnimations

Map of all node animations.

Animations are in the order of which their nodes are reached in a breadth-first-search (BFS) of the joint hierarchy

Note
Animations may exist for nodes without bones, so a vector ordered by bones is not sufficient
